resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/3733577</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>3733577</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>4124b117-31ac-45d6-2d10-f14d72a3319d#1#7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Városok kialakulása: az ubaid és az uruk kultúra művészete</string>
            <string language="en">Development of cities: the art of ubaid and uruk culture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entwicklung der Städte: die kunst ubaid 
und uruk der Kultur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Développement des villes : l'art de la 
culture d'ubaid et d'uruk</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenvolvimento das cidades: a arte da 
cultura do ubaid e do uruk</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sviluppo delle città: arte della coltura 
del uruk e del ubaid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανάπτυξη των πόλεων: η τέχνη του ubaid και 
uruk του πολιτισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Desarrollo de ciudades: el arte de la 
cultura del ubaid y del uruk</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A mezopotámiai városi fejlődés kialakulásának valamint a korszak régészeti kultúráinak - az ubaid és az uruk kultúra - kerámiaművészetének bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">presentation of the development of the formation of mesopotamian cities and the archeologist culture of the age - the ubaid and the uruk culture-  ceramic art</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">kerámia,  neolitikus,  Szamarra,  Haszúna,  Halaf,  </string>
            <string language="en">ceramic, neolithic, samarra, hasuna, halaf</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung der Entwicklung der Anordnung von 
mesopotamian Städte und der Archäologe Kultur des Alters - das ubaid
und die keramische kunst der uruk Kultur</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">présentation du développement de la formation 
des villes mesopotamian et de la culture d'archéologue de l'âge - 
l'ubaid et l'art en céramique de culture d'uruk</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">apresentação do desenvolvimento da formação 
de cidades mesopotamian e da cultura do arqueólogo da idade - o ubaid
e a arte cerâmica da cultura do uruk</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">presentazione dello sviluppo della formazione 
delle città mesopotamian e della coltura dell'archeologo dell'età - 
il ubaid ed arte di ceramica della coltura del uruk</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρουσίαση της ανάπτυξης του σχηματισμού των 
μεσοποτάμιων πόλεων και του πολιτισμού αρχαιολόγων της ηλικίας - 
το ubaid και ο πολιτισμός uruk - κεραμική τέχνη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">presentación del desarrollo de la formación de 
ciudades mesopotamian y de la cultura del arqueólogo de la edad - el 
ubaid y el arte de cerámica de la cultura del uruk</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">keramisch, neolithisch, samarra, hasuna, halaf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">en céramique, néolithique, samarra, hasuna, halaf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cerâmico, neolithic, samarra, hasuna, halaf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">di ceramica, neolithic, samarra, hasuna, halaf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κεραμικός, νεολιθικός, samarra, hasuna, halaf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">de cerámica, neolítico, samarra, hasuna, halaf</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">11-13</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:Kossuth Kiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>3733577</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
